greeting: Hello! Welcome to Tamizhan Skills. How can I help you today?
courses: Tamizhan Skills offers Web Development, Python, Full Stack, Cybersecurity, AI, and more. We also provide 1-month mini-courses with internship-level projects.
fees: Our course fees are affordable — starting from ₹1,999. Some advanced certifications may cost more.
duration: Courses usually range from 4 to 12 weeks, depending on the track. Mini-courses are often 1 month long.
instructors: Our trainers are experienced professionals from the tech and education industry.
placement: We offer placement support after course completion, including internship opportunities and resume building.
free_training: We offer 100% free training for transgender and differently-abled individuals. Inclusive education matters.
competitive: Yes! We offer live and recorded training for competitive exams like SSC, JEE, NEET, TNPSC, RRB, and more.
certificates: You receive verifiable certificates upon completion, supported by Wipro DICE-ID.
credential: We are credential partners with Wipro DICE-ID, so your certificates can be verified for credibility.
contact: You can reach us at contact@tamizhanskills.com or call +91-63834-18100 / +91-80725-01431.
whatsapp: You can also message us on WhatsApp using +91-6383418100.
website: Visit our official website at https://www.tamizhanskills.com for more info and enrollment.
enroll: To enroll, go to our website > select a course > click Register and follow the steps.
location: We're based in Tamil Nadu but offer **online courses** you can join from anywhere in India.
timing: Course timings are flexible, including evening and weekend batches.
languages: Courses are available in Tamil and English depending on the batch and trainer.
demo: We provide demo sessions for selected courses. Reach out to request a demo.
support: We're here to help! Ask us about courses, fees, certification, or training support.
exit: Thanks for visiting Tamizhan Skills. Have a great day!
